channel.title: math.GN updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.GN updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: The completeness of free Boolean topological groups
item.description: arXiv:2507.12289v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: It is proved that the free Boolean topological group $B(X)$ on a Tychonoff space $X$ is Weil complete if and only if the space $X$ is Dieudonn\'e complete. This result provides a positive answer to a question posed by the first listed author in 2015.
item.dc:creator: Ol'ga V. Sipacheva, Mikhail G. Tkachenko

item.title: Orbit sets, transitivity, and sensitivity with upper semicontinuous maps
item.description: arXiv:2507.12272v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: Given a compact metric space $X$ and an upper semicontinuous function $F\colon X \to 2^X$, we explore the dynamic system $(X,F)$. In this study, we introduce new concepts, demonstrate various results, and provide numerous examples. In particular, we define the orbit set $\mathcal{O}_F(p)$ and prove that it is compact. We also establish conditions for connectedness of the orbit sets and pose several questions related to the system. We also investigate transitivity and its relation to the density of orbits. In addition, we present strong and weak notions of sensitivity and examine the relationships between these concepts.
item.dc:creator: Jeison Amorocho, Javier Camargo, Sergio Mac\'ias
